Body: Possible Duplicate:  How do I update the OS on my device?  What can you do with Samsung Kies for Android phones?  I tried to update my phone: About phone -> System updatesbut it gaved this message: network connection lost..I was connecting via wifi to the internet, but it gave the same error message when connecting to mobile network. Why? Why does it gives this error? The phone has Android 4.1.1, with kernel 3.0.13, type number: B928A
Title: How to update a Samsung i9220?
